results.name: a(n) is the binary length of A324398(n), where A324398(n) = A156552(n) AND (A323243(n) - A156552(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (based on Hans Havermann's factorization of A156552)
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: A324398(n) = { my(k=A156552(n)); bitand(k,(A323243(n)-k)); }; \\ Needs also code from A323243.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 27 2019
